channel.title: Fixing Zones
channel.description:
How do I fix the safe/wild zone glitch on a pimpscape based server?
The Glitch: The dummy area in varrock is not all safe. There are some wild zones in it.
;)

item.title: Fixing Zones
item.dc:creator: @sgt_yoshi sgt yoshi
item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

Ta

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing Zones
item.dc:creator: @Wildcat_240 Wildcat_240
item.description:
@Wildcat_240 wrote:

Add something like this: || (absX >= South West Corner&& absX <= North East Corner && absY >= South West Corner && absY <= Norht East Corner)

I think that’s How it goes =\ It’s either south west north east, or south east North west. Let me explain it a bit incase you don’t get it. If you wanted to make all of Varrock a safe zone, you’d go to the farhest southwest you could go, get the co-ords and plug em in there. Then go the farthest northeast you want, and plug those in. Remember that it’s Southwest X-Co-ord, then Northeast X, Southwest Y, Northeast Y. If that’s the last one in the list, put: || (absX >= South West Corner&& absX <= North East Corner && absY >= South West Corner && absY <= Norht East Corner))<<< A second ) Hope I helped.

Read full topic
